title.rendered: Wyndham Brings Rewards to its Business Program, Simplifies Travel for Businesses of All Sizes

content.rendered:
Comprehensive program offers points on qualified business spend, employee status gifting, a minimum 10% room discount, easy direct billing, instant group bookings and more

For a limited time, businesses can earn a future free hotel night when they join  Wyndham Rewards Business and complete a qualified stay by June 30

PARSIPPANY, N.J., April 16, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Whether you’re a startup looking to maximize travel budgets, a travel manager wanting to recognize employees, or a construction foreman needing a last-minute, multi-week group booking—managing your company’s travel needs is now easier than ever thanks to Wyndham and its newly expanded, free-to-join, Wyndham Business program.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wyndham-brings-rewards-to-its-business-program-simplifies-travel-for-businesses-of-all-sizes-302118006.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
